page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: Football in Dunfermline is a major spectator sport. Even now when they are in the second division, Dunfermline Athletic had the second biggest total attendance out of the first and second divisions. Their ground, East End Park, has a modern stadium and is one of the best in Scotland. Bowlers in the area are well catered for, there being three bowling greens in our block. Most of the bowlers are older men or women. In the centre of Dunfermline there are two sports centres, the Bruce Street Hall and the Carnegie Centre. Bruce Street Hall floor is marked out for various sports. The Carnegie Centre has two swimming pools, one for younger swimmers and the other for older people. They also have several gyms and clubs in the centre covering
